title: How do I include web pages background colors when printing
body: Printing to the "Microsoft Print to PDF" Printer does not show background colors of table cells or DIV tags.  How can I include these background colors in the "Print to PDF"?

comments.body:
CSS color-adjust, just added in Firefox 48, been in WebKit for ages with a prefix
https://drafts.csswg.org/css-color-4/#color-adjust

I cannot believe this is missing, this is basic stuff.
Please respect the CSS Print Media standards.
